name: SLIDOU
description:
SLIDOU
		is a simple game, you are a small careless slime and you move forward into a damp cave.  Turtles and bats are coming at you, you must dodge them and try to grab the coins.

	Get as far as you can without being touched.

	The game is currently launched on Google Play, if I get asked I can make a stand alone version of it.  It won't be able to access the leaderboard and achievements tho.
